description.en: Experience an unmatched Dubai lifestyle at Sobha Hartland, a waterfront community featuring luxury apartments & villas. Experience inspired living in an 8 million sq. ft. waterfront community of luxurious apartments, villas, and townhouses in Sobha Hartland, Dubai. Sobha Hartland epitomises a lifestyle of comfort and luxury, standing as one of Dubai's premier communities offering a captivating living experience. This exclusive enclave presents a diverse range of upscale residences, including lavish apartments, high-end villas, and opulent townhouses, all designed to elevate the standard of living. Boasting world-class amenities, Sobha Hartland is a testament to sophisticated living in the heart of Dubai.
